pages.text: Snow Leopars are big cats that can be found in snowy and mountainous biomes. For lucky, they are not aggresive towards humans.$(br2)They will hunt other animals like Sheeps or Horsers.$(br2)You can't tame them but you still bred them with Raw Moose Ribs, this meat is dropped by $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/moose)Mooses$(/l).
